actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to require the Attorney General to employ additional personnel to patrol the borders of the United States, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires the Attorney General to employ additional personnel pursuant to the Immigration and Nationality Act to patrol the borders of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to require the Attorney General to employ additional personnel to patrol the borders of the United States, and for other purposes.
